name: Tigr CRM
tagline: Ruby on Rails Web CRM with social networks integration.
body:
Web CRM Open Source project by SLCTD team.

## Demo 
[Heroku Demo Site](http://tigr-crm.herokuapp.com/)

License - Open Source [GPL3](https://github.com/slctd/tigr-crm/blob/master/LICENSE.txt).
Please feel free to fork and commit.

## Team:

Project Leader - [Sergey Smirnov](https://github.com/sergous)

Rails Developer - [Alexander Borovykh](https://github.com/ImmaculatePine)

Rails Developer - [Artur Trofimov](https://github.com/arturtr)

Administrator - Alex Kanogin.
